description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
General
- Fixed an issue where IdeaPad attempted to get the GodModeController version.
- Fixed an issue where GetBIOSOCMode caused the Custom Mode Configuration window to raise an error on Generation 8 or 9 AMD laptops, preventing it from displaying.
- Patch Note will now be correctly display when update from Server method.
